title: I want to wash my car. The car wash is 50 meters away. Should I walk or drive?
author: novemp
aiHeadline: Man struggles to decide whether to walk 50 meters or drive his car to wash his car, because modern life is just that absurd.

title: Ministry of Justice orders deletion of the UK's largest court reporting database
author: harel
aiHeadline: Government officials decide to delete the UK's largest court reporting database, proving once again that they're experts at wasting resources and losing important information.

title: 14-year-old Miles Wu folded origami pattern that holds 10k times its own weight
author: bookofjoe
aiHeadline: 14-year-old genius invents origami pattern that can hold 10,000 times its weight, while adults struggle to fold a paper airplane correctly.

title: Qwen3.5: Towards Native Multimodal Agents
author: danielhanchen
aiHeadline: AI researchers announce Qwen3.5, the latest attempt to create a multimodal agent that can handle everything, because clearly, making one thing work perfectly isn't good enough.

title: Anthropic tries to hide Claude's AI actions. Devs hate it
author: beardyw
aiHeadline: Anthropic hides Claude's AI actions from developers, sparking outrage and proving that nothing annoys tech professionals more than being kept in the dark about their own tools.
